alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cooke and western Grayson Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1045 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thackerville, or 10 miles south of Marietta, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Whitesboro, Pilot Point, Collinsville, Muenster, Gunter, Lindsay, Callisburg, Hubert H Moss Lake, Lake Kiowa, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Lake Muenster, Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Tioga, Road Runner, Valley View, Sadler, Walnut Bend and Leo. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 482 and 503. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
